content: I asked for more details on the thread; and mentioned Felix (strifel) who wrote the integration and may be able to debug efficiently.

I looked and it seems like I run the newest stable version (somehow) and it does work.
They wrote that they use the 2.4 beta, already.
So this might be an issue coming up.

I think the best way to fix this is to finally get #16580 ready to be merged. (I will fix the failing tests in the next couple days)
Yeah, that seems like a reasonable plan.
